goes up

description: The trap can be generated when the Diameter Server
returns 3xxx (Protocol Errors), 4xxx (Transient Failures), or
5xxx (Permanent Failure) Result-Code AVP (268)
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apDiameterSrvrErrorResultTrap AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apDiamAcctSrvrHostName s EXAMPLE AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apDiamAcctSrvrIPPort s EXAMPLE AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apDiamAcctSrvrOriginRealm s EXAMPLE AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apDiamAcctSrvrOriginHost s EXAMPLE AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apDiamAcctSrvrTransportType i 0 AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apDiameterResultCode i 1001

description: The upper threshold trap shall be sent when ACRq usage
reaches to the configured acr-buffer-upper-threshold value.
For ex. acr-buffer-upper-threshold=90 and acr-buffer-lower-threshold=60.
so once ACRq usages reaches to the 90, upper threshold trap shall be sent.

event.Summary: ACRq usage reached configured acr-buffer-upper-threshold of $v3

description: The current measured percentage value of
space available.
variables.name: AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apAcctMsgQueueAvailCurrent

description: Confiured percentage of lower threshold
variables.name: AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apAcctMsgQueueLowerThreshold

description: Confiured percentage of upper threshold
variables.name: AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apAcctMsgQueueUpperThreshold

description: The upper threshold clear trap shall be sent when ACRq usages
reaches to the configured acr-buffer-lower-threshold value and
upper threshold trap was sent earlier. For ex. acr-buffer-upper-threshold=90
and acr-buffer-lower-threshold=60. so once ACRq usages hit 90% and upper
threshold trap triggered then after taking corrective actions it recovers
and reached to the 60, upper threshold clear trap shall be sent.

event.Summary: ACRq usage fell below configured acr-buffer-upper-threshold

description: The current measured percentage value of
space available.
variables.name: AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apAcctMsgQueueAvailCurrent

description: Confiured percentage of lower threshold
variables.name: AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apAcctMsgQueueLowerThreshold

description: Confiured percentage of upper threshold
variables.name: AP-DIAMETER-MIB::apAcctMsgQueueUpperThreshold
